Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Imposes requirements for unsolicited private government-related registration service communications
Summary: Requires any person or entity, whether located within the state or sending physical or electronic mail to a person within the state, sending an unsolicited private government-related registration service communication that mentions any fees, renewal charges, requests for payment, or requests to enter into a contract, shall include a notice that is reasonably calculated to apprise the recipient that they are not a government entity or affiliated with one and the recipient is not required to pay or enter into any agreement with them.
LawCode: Add ยง350-f-2, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requirements for unsolicited private government-related registration service communications
